name: Five Below Zero
description:
Trapped survivors on a research mission in the Antarctic have discovered a terrifying monster deep in the snow. Conserving power, maintaining communication, and defending their base is essential if they hope to ever be rescued. Can you help them stay alive?

Basic Controls: 

  • Left click on a character to select them, right click to interact
  • WASD to pan camera
  • Mouse Wheel to zoom

To Be Implemented:

  • Rescue
  • Random character appearance
  • Camera snap to selected character
  • Visual bullets

Known Bugs:

  • 'Head' Camera tracking on Security differs from others
